## Properties

| Property           | Attribute           | Description                                                                                                          | Type      | Default |
| ------------------ | ------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `disabled`         | `disabled`          | If present, sets a disabled state on the accordion, indicating that no part of it can be manipulated by user action. | `boolean` | `false` |
| `disallowMultiple` | `disallow-multiple` | ***** toggles disallow muiltiple - default false ********                                                            | `boolean` | `false` |
